name: status
description: Run accessibility scan (axe-core) and HTML validation across several URLs

scripts.ci-scan: evaluatory --config "config.json" --no-open-results && npm run ci-header && npm run ci-disclaimer && npm run ci-footer
scripts.ci-disclaimer:
sed -i '' -e 's|
|

These reports do not validate accessibility compliance. The included test results cover less than 50% of WCAG Success Criteria. Manual testing is always required to validate compliance and ensure best practices.

|g' local-reports/*.html
scripts.ci-footer: sed -i '' -e 's|Handmade with 四Powered by Evaluatory. Handmade with 四g' reports/*.html
scripts.scan: evaluatory --config "config.json" --output "local-reports" && npm run header && npm run disclaimer && npm run footer
scripts.disclaimer:
sed -i '' -e 's|
|

These reports do not validate accessibility compliance. The included test results cover less than 50% of WCAG Success Criteria. Manual testing is always required to validate compliance and ensure best practices.

|g' local-reports/*.html
scripts.footer: sed -i '' -e 's|Handmade with 四Powered by Evaluatory. Handmade with 四g' local-reports/*.html
